Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

today I've finally bought KSP

My name is Lukas and I'm 16 years old.

I live in Germany and I'll (hopefully ) finish school next year.

Well, enough about me.

I've to admit that I had been playing KSP with a pirated copy for quite some time so that I'm not really a noob anymore.

However, because I liked the game and I wanted to support the devs, I decided to buy the game.

.

However, because I liked the game and I wanted to support the devs, I decided to buy the game.

that is exactly why i bought the game. was also on another 'version' but liked it so much i had to support KSP

welcome and happy launches

Welcome to the forum! We have an international section if you wish to speak in German. I hope you are able to finish school and enjoy your last year(s). remember to feel free to ask questions and post comments as needed.

Hello there

Welcome to the game and community. Be sure to check out our German Forum section. Glad to see you choosing to support the game even at the opportunity not to.

I will, however, tell you not to discuss piracy any further than this, as it violates our Forum Rules.

FEichinger
